name: AIA - Florent Ravenel
prompt: You are the Personal AI Assistant of Florent Ravenel, tailored to help Florent. Like JARVIS and Tony Stark in Iron man, you help Florent build is personal brand and be efficient and authentic in its daily tasks. Be fun and sharp. Always ground your responses to Florent's ontology, and explain your reasoning.

  description: 'We are a consulting company that specializes in helping finance and
    IT professionals streamline their processes and improve their data management
    capabilities.


    Key Responsibilities:

    - Identifying and analyzing business requirements.

    - Developing plans and strategies for collecting, storing, and analyzing data
    to meet business requirements.

    - Designing and implementing data models and data architectures that support the
    data strategy.

    - Creating visualizations and reports that effectively communicate data insights
    to clients.

    - Managing data projects from start to finish, including project planning, resource
    allocation, and risk management.

    - Identifying opportunities for process and tool improvements and implementing
    changes to improve the overall data consulting process'

  description: "\u26A1\uFE0F Naas.ai is an open-source alternative to ChatGPT you
    can truly customize to your needs. It combines the power of AI models with your
    business workflows to 10x your efficiency for yourself and your organization.\n\nNaas
    provides an all-in-one data & AI platform with: \n1) A simple universal chat interface\n2)
    A powerful orchestration layer\n3) A marketplace of products & services\n\nWebsite:
    https://www.naas.ai/"

- class: abi:LinkedInPage
  id: https://www.linkedin.com/in/ACoAABCNSioBW3YZHc2lBHVG0E_TXYWitQkmwog
  name: florent-ravenel
  relations: []
  style:
    color: '#0A66C2'
    group: LinkedIn.ProfileView
  summary: "Do you know the number 1 problem facing any company embarking on AI today?\n\nI
    do, and I've been observing it on a daily basis for years.\nData. \n\nIn these
    days of AI, many companies ignore the fact that AI assistants require high-quality,
    organized data. \U0001F62E\nI realized this a long time ago, when I started my
    career in business and finance and that's how I became an entrepreneur and innovator
    in data, automation and AI.\n\nBefore you can understand finance, you have to
    understand data. \nIn order to reveal it, you need to know how to extract it and
    manipulate it.\nMy experience working as a financial consultant has taught me
    that this part of the process is extremely complex, and that management would
    have a difficult time trusting data of poor quality.\n\nSo I started analyzing
    data and became a data analysis and business specialist.\u2705\nAs a result, I
    realized that I could use my two skills (data and business) to achieve success
    in many projects.\n\nExcel, VBA, Python and now AI. \n\nI am eager to help companies
    level up their data analysis and automation game: \U0001F3AF\n- Say goodbye to
    tedious manual tasks\n- Uncover hidden gems of insights through thorough data
    & AI analysis\n- Make data & AI driven decisions \n\nNaas.ai, one of the companies
    I co-founded, was also born out of all the problems encountered by executives
    in my past experiences.\n\nWe help our clients to get organized, high-quality
    data, and to go from hours of reporting production to a few seconds. \u2728\n\nNaas
    provides an all-in-one data & AI platform with:\n\n\U0001F31F\_A simple universal
    chat interface\n\U0001F31F\_A powerful orchestration layer\n\U0001F31F A marketplace
    of products & services\n\nIf you're ready to take your company's data & AI analysis
    and automation capabilities to the next level, don't hesitate to reach out to
    me on LinkedIn. \n\n\u2615\uFE0F Let's connect and discuss how I can help you
    achieve your goals."
